introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.p1: Welcome to BuyMeACoffee-Africa ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your data when you use our platform.
introduction.p2: By using BuyMeACoffee-Africa, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.item1: Account Information: Name, email address, username, and password
personal.item2: Profile Information: Profile picture, bio, creator description, and links to your social media or website
personal.item3: Payment Information: Mobile Money number, transaction details, and payment history
personal.item4: Communication Data: Messages, support inquiries, and feedback you send to us

automated.title: Automatically Collected Information
automated.intro: We automatically collect certain information when you use our platform:
automated.item1: Usage Data: Pages visited, time spent on pages, clicks, and navigation patterns
automated.item2: Device Information: IP address, browser type, operating system, device identifiers
automated.item3: Cookies and Tracking Technologies: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Information
thirdParty.intro: If you sign in using third-party services (e.g., GitHub, Google), we may receive:
thirdParty.item1: Basic profile information (name, email, profile picture)
thirdParty.item3: Any other information you authorize the third-party service to share

infoUse.title: How We Use Your Information
infoUse.intro: We use your personal information for the following purposes:

serviceDelivery.title: Service Delivery
serviceDelivery.item3: Enabling communication between creators and supporters

improvement.title: Platform Improvement
improvement.item1: Analyzing usage patterns to improve our services

communication.title: Communication
communication.item1: Sending transactional emails (donation confirmations, account updates)
communication.item3: Responding to your inquiries and support requests

security.title: Security and Compliance
security.item1: Detecting and preventing fraud, abuse, and security incidents
security.item3: Complying with legal obligations and regulations

infoShare.title: How We Share Your Information
infoShare.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your data only in the following circumstances:
infoShare.importantNote: Important: Your privacy is our priority. We only share information when necessary to provide services or comply with legal requirements.
infoShare.item1: With Your Consent: When you explicitly authorize us to do so
infoShare.item2: Service Providers: Payment processors, cloud hosting, authentication services, and analytics providers
infoShare.item3: Public Information: Creator profiles and usernames you choose to make public
infoShare.item4: Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
infoShare.item5: Business Transfers: In case of merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

securityMeasures.title: Security Measures
securityMeasures.intro: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data:
securityMeasures.item2: Encryption of sensitive data at rest

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.p1: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. If you delete your account, we will delete or anonymize your data within 90 days, except where we must retain it for legal or regulatory purposes.

rightsChoices.title: Your Rights and Choices
rightsChoices.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.title: Access & Portability
access.item1: ‚Ä¢ Request a copy of your data
access.item2: ‚Ä¢ Receive data in a portable format

rightsChoices.p1: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at privacy@buymeacoffee-africa.com

childrensPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.p1: BuyMeACoffee-Africa is not intended for children under 13 years of age (or under 16 in the European Union). We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we discover that we have collected data from a child, we will delete it immediately. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us.
